title: Designing Multimedia-Based Character Exploration Learning: Application to Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Implementation of multimedia language inquiry activities combined with character values in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners enhance collaborative problem-solving skills by analyzing language materials using multimedia tools
Learners apply character values of consideration, communication, and responsibility in digital content creation through reflective questioning
Learners produce outcomes improved by 20% in language expression accuracy and creativity based on peer evaluation in e-learning platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
